name.str: Hologram Projector - Locator of Flesh Forest

description: This is a hologram projector which generates an interactive hologram when you activate it. Hologram can talk to you, answer some of your questions, but most importantly, it can locate Flesh Forest

use_action.summon_msg: Hologram appears in front of you!
